summary.span: 代表類型宣告：類別類型、介面類型、陣列類型、值類型、列舉類型、類型參數、泛型類型定義，以及開放式或封閉式的建構泛型類型。

span.span: Represents type declarations: class types, interface types, array types, value types, enumeration types, type parameters, generic type definitions, and open or closed constructed generic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Type` 是的根功能主要的方法來存取中繼資料。`Type` is the root of the functionality and is the primary way to access metadata. 使用的成員取得型別宣告，成員的類型 （例如建構函式、 方法、 欄位、 屬性和事件的類別） 的詳細資訊，以及模組和組件部署所在的類別。Use the members of to get information about a type declaration, about the members of a type (such as the constructors, methods, fields, properties, and events of a class), as well as the module and the assembly in which the class is deployed. 不不需要使用反映來取得資訊類型和成員，無論其存取層級的程式碼的任何權限。No permissions are required for code to use reflection to get information about types and their members, regardless of their access levels. 不不需要使用反映來存取公用成員或其存取層級會讓它們顯示在一般的編譯期間的其他成員的程式碼的任何權限。No permissions are required for code to use reflection to access public members, or other members whose access levels would make them visible during normal compilation. 不過，為了讓程式碼以使用反映來存取成員，通常會無法存取，例如私用或內部的方法，或受保護類型的欄位不會繼承您的類別，您的程式碼必須。However, in order for your code to use reflection to access members that would normally be inaccessible, such as private or internal methods, or protected fields of a type your class does not inherit, your code must have . 請參閱[反映的安全性考量](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). `Type` 是抽象基底類別，可讓多個實作。`Type` is an abstract base class that allows multiple implementations. 系統一律會提供衍生的類別`RuntimeType`。The system will always provide the derived class `RuntimeType`. 在反映中，執行階段的字為開頭的所有類別都建立一次，每個系統及支援的比較作業中的物件。In reflection, all classes beginning with the word Runtime are created only once per object in the system and support comparison operations. > [!NOTE] > 在多執行緒的情況下，不會鎖定物件，若要同步處理存取`static`資料。In multithreading scenarios, do not lock objects in order to synchronize access to `static` data. 其他的程式碼中，然後再對其，您有任何控制項，也可能會鎖定您的類別類型。Other code, over which you have no control, might also lock your class type. 這可能會導致死結。This might result in a deadlock. 相反地，同步處理靜態資料的存取權鎖定私用`static`物件。Instead, synchronize access to static data by locking a private `static` object. > [!NOTE] > 在衍生的類別可以存取受保護的成員呼叫的程式碼基底類別。A derived class can access protected members of the calling code's base classes. 此外，呼叫程式碼的組件的組件成員被允許存取。Also, access is allowed to assembly members of the calling code's assembly. 一般而言，如果您允許存取在早期繫結程式碼，然後您也可以存取晚期繫結程式碼中。As a rule, if you are allowed access in early-bound code, then you are also allowed access in late-bound code. > [!NOTE] > 擴充其他介面的介面不會繼承擴充介面中定義的方法。Interfaces that extend other interfaces do not inherit the methods defined in the extended interfaces. 本節內容：In this section: [型別物件代表何種類型？](#WhatTypes) [What types does a Type object represent?](#WhatTypes) [擷取型別物件](#Retrieve) [Retrieving a Type object](#Retrieve) [比較相等的型別物件Comparing type objects for equality](#Equality) ## 型別物件代表何種類型？What types does a Type object represent? 此類別具備執行緒安全;多個執行緒可以同時讀取這種類型的執行個體。This class is thread safe; multiple threads can concurrently read from an instance of this type. 執行個體類別可代表任何下列類型：An instance of the class can represent any of the following types: - 類別Classes - 值類型Value types - 陣列Arrays - 介面Interfaces - 列舉Enumerations - 委派Delegates - 建構泛型型別和泛型類型定義Constructed generic types and generic type definitions - 型別引數和型別參數的建構泛型類型、 泛型類型定義，以及泛型方法定義Type arguments and type parameters of constructed generic types, generic type definitions, and generic method definitions ## 擷取型別物件Retrieving a Type object 特定型別相關聯的物件可以透過下列方式取得：The object associated with a particular type can be obtained in the following ways: - 執行個體方法會傳回物件，表示執行個體的類型。The instance method returns a object that represents the type of an instance. 因為所有的 managed 型別衍生自，則可以在任何類型的執行個體上呼叫方法。Because all managed types derive from , the method can be called on an instance of any type. 下列範例會呼叫方法，以判斷物件陣列中每個物件的執行階段類型。The following example calls the method to determine the runtime type of each object in an object array. [!code-cpp[System.Type#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cpp/GetType1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Type#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cs/GetType1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/vb/GetType1.vb#2)] - 靜態方法會傳回物件，表示其完整名稱所指定的型別。The static methods return a object that represents a type specified by its fully qualified name. - ， ，並方法會傳回`Type`代表模組中定義之類型的物件。The , , and methods return `Type` objects that represent the types defined in a module. 第一種方法可以用來取得各種的所有公用和私用類型的模組中定義的物件。The first method can be used to obtain an array of objects for all the public and private types defined in a module. (您可以取得的執行個體`Module`透過或是方法，或透過屬性。)(You can obtain an instance of `Module` through the or method, or through the property.) - 物件包含數個方法來擷取組件，包括中定義的類別， ，和。The object contains a number of methods to retrieve the classes defined in an assembly, including , , and . - 方法會傳回型別所支援的介面類型的篩選的清單。The method returns a filtered list of interface types supported by a type. - 方法會傳回`Type`物件，表示項目。The method returns a `Type` object that represents the element. - 並方法會傳回代表類型所支援的介面類型的物件。The and methods return objects representing the interface types supported by a type. - 方法傳回的陣列代表任意一組物件所指定類型的物件。The method returns an array of objects representing the types specified by an arbitrary set of objects. 物件會指定類型的陣列與。The objects are specified with an array of type . - 和方法可供 COM 互通性。The and methods are provided for COM interoperability. 它們會傳回物件，表示所指定的型別`ProgID`或`CLSID`。They return a object that represents the type specified by a `ProgID` or `CLSID`. - 方法提供互通性。The method is provided for interoperability. 它會傳回`Type`物件，表示類別的控制代碼所指定的型別。It returns a `Type` object that represents the type specified by a class handle. - C#`typeof`運算子，c + +`typeid`運算子，以及 Visual Basic`GetType`運算子取得`Type`型別的物件。The C# `typeof` operator, the C++ `typeid` operator, and the Visual Basic `GetType` operator obtain the `Type` object for a type. - 方法會傳回物件，表示建構的泛型類型，也就是開放式建構的類型，如果其屬性會傳回`true`，和封閉式建構類型否則。The method returns a object representing a constructed generic type, which is an open constructed type if its property returns `true`, and a closed constructed type otherwise. 只有當它已關閉，可以具現化泛型型別。A generic type can be instantiated only if it is closed. - ， ，並方法會傳回分別代表指定的型別、 指定的型別和參考參數的類型的指標陣列的物件 (`ref`以 C# `ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中)。The , , and methods return objects that represent, respectively, an array of a specified type, a pointer to a specified type, and the type of a reference parameter (`ref` in C#, `ByRef` in Visual Basic). ## 比較相等的型別物件Comparing type objects for equality A代表類型是唯一的物件，也就是兩個物件參考會參考相同的物件，如果且只有它們代表相同的型別。A object that represents a type is unique; that is, two object references refer to the same object if and only if they represent the same type. 這是用來比較物件，使用參考相等。This allows for comparison of objects using reference equality. 下列範例會比較表示的整數值，以判斷它們是否相同類型的數字的物件。The following example compares the objects that represent a number of integer values to determine whether they are of the same type. [!code-cpp[System.Type#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cpp/Equals1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Type#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cs/Equals1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Type#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/vb/Equals1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下列範例顯示一些具代表性的功能的。The following example shows a few representative features of . C#`typeof`運算子 (`GetType` Visual Basic 中的運算子`typeid`Visual c + + 運算子) 用來取得物件，表示。The C# `typeof` operator (`GetType` operator in Visual Basic, `typeid` operator in Visual C++) is used to get a object representing . 從此物件，方法來取得代表多載，起始的位置和長度。From this object, the method is used to get a representing the overload that takes a starting location and a length. 若要識別多載簽章，程式碼範例會建立暫存陣列，包含兩個物件代表`int`(`Integer` Visual Basic 中)。To identify the overload signature, the code example creates a temporary array containing two objects representing `int` (`Integer` in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 若要精確地說，陣列會包含兩個執行個體的參考表示`int`目前的應用程式定義域中。To be precise, the array contains two references to the instance of that represents `int` in the current application domain. 對於任何類型，沒有只有一個執行個體每個應用程式網域。For any type, there is only one instance of per application domain. 此程式碼範例會使用叫用方法在字串"Hello，World ！"，並顯示結果。The code example uses the to invoke the method on the string "Hello, World!", and displays the result. [!code-cpp[System.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type/vb/source.vb#1)]

value.span: 若為泛型類型，則此執行個體描述的是含有泛型類型定義的組件，而不是建立與使用特定建構類型的組件。

span.span: For generic types, the instance describes the assembly that contains the generic type definition, not the assembly that creates and uses a particular constructed type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前物件代表建構的泛型型別，這個屬性會傳回包含泛型型別定義的組件。If the current object represents a constructed generic type, this property returns the assembly that contains the generic type definition. 例如，假設您建立名為 MyGenerics.dll 包含泛型型別定義的組件`MyGenericStack`(`MyGenericStack(Of T)` Visual Basic 中`generic ref class MyGenericStack`c + + 中)。For example, suppose you create an assembly named MyGenerics.dll that contains the generic type definition `MyGenericStack` (`MyGenericStack(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class MyGenericStack` in C++). 如果您建立的執行個體`MyGenericStack`(`MyGenericStack(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中) 中另一個組件，建構類型的屬性會傳回表示 MyGenerics.dll 物件。If you create an instance of `MyGenericStack` (`MyGenericStack(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) in another assembly, the property for the constructed type returns an object that represents MyGenerics.dll. 同樣地，如果目前物件表示未指派的泛型參數`T`，這個屬性會傳回包含泛型型別定義的組件`T`。Similarly, if the current object represents an unassigned generic parameter `T`, this property returns the assembly that contains the generic type that defines `T`. 如果屬性並不適用於特定的.NET 實作，例如.NET Core 或通用 Windows 平台，請使用屬性改為。If the property is not available on a particular .NET implementation, such as .NET Core or the Universal Windows Platform, use the property instead. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示與類別相關聯的組件名稱和型別的完整的名稱。The following example displays the assembly name associated with the class and the fully qualified name of the type. [!code-cpp[Type_Assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CPP/type_assembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_Assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CS/type_assembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_Assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/VB/type_assembly.vb#1)]

span.span: The assembly-qualified name of the , which includes the name of the assembly from which the was loaded, or if the current instance represents a generic type parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類型的組件限定名稱是由型別名稱，包括其命名空間，後面接著逗號，後面接著組件的顯示名稱所組成。The assembly-qualified name of a type consists of the type name, including its namespace, followed by a comma, followed by the display name of the assembly. 使用取得組件的顯示名稱屬性。The display name of an assembly is obtained using the property. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，處理器架構會新增至組件識別，而且可以指定為組件名稱字串的一部分。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings. 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil". 不過，它不包含在所傳回的字串屬性，因為相容性。However, it is not included in the string returned by the property, for compatibility reasons. 請參閱 。See . 支援通用語言執行平台的所有編譯器都發出的簡單名稱的巢狀類別，並反映建構查詢時，根據下列慣例 mangled 的名稱。All compilers that support the common language runtime emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions. |分隔符號Delimiter|意義Meaning| |---------------|-------------| |反斜線 (\\)Backslash (\\)|逸出字元。Escape character.| |逗號 （，）Comma (,)|後面接著組件名稱。Precedes the Assembly name.| |加號 （+）Plus sign (+)|在之前的巢狀的類別。Precedes a nested class.| |句號 （.）Period (.)|表示命名空間識別項。Denotes namespace identifiers.| |括號 ([])Brackets ([])|在類型名稱之後，即表示該類型的陣列。After a type name, denotes an array of that type.

-或--or-

對於泛型類型，封入泛型型別引數清單。For a generic type, encloses the generic type argument list.

-或--or-

在類型引數清單中，將組件限定型別。Within a type argument list, encloses an assembly-qualified type.| 例如，類別的組件限定名稱可能如下所示：For example, the assembly-qualified name for a class might look like this: ``` TopNamespace.SubNameSpace.ContainingClass+NestedClass, MyAssembly, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b17a5c561934e089 ``` 如果命名空間包含加號時，例如 TopNamespace.Sub+Namespace 則加號 （+） 會加上逸出字元 (\\) 以防止它被解譯為巢狀分隔符號。If the namespace contained a plus sign, for example TopNamespace.Sub+Namespace, then the plus sign (+) would be preceded by an escape character (\\) to prevent it from being interpreted as a nesting separator. 反映會發出此字串，如下所示：Reflection would emit this string as follows: ``` TopNamespace.Sub\+Namespace.ContainingClass+NestedClass, MyAssembly, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b17a5c561934e089 ``` "+ +"會變成"\\+\\+"，和 「\\」 變成 「\\\\"。A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\". 這個限定的名稱可以保存和更新版本用來載入。This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the . 搜尋並載入，使用使用型別名稱只有或使用組件限定的類型名稱。To search for and load a , use either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name. 與型別名稱只會尋找呼叫者的組件中，然後在系統組件中。 with the type name only will look for the in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly. 與組件限定的類型名稱會尋找任何組件中。 with the assembly qualified type name will look for the in any assembly. 類型名稱可能包含行尾字元來表示的類型，例如類型是否為參考型別、 指標類型或陣列類型的其他資訊。Type names may include trailing characters that denote additional information about the type, such as whether the type is a reference type, a pointer type or an array type. 若要擷取的型別名稱，而不需要這些後置字元，請使用`t.GetElementType().ToString()`，其中`t`是型別。To retrieve the type name without these trailing characters, use `t.GetElementType().ToString()`, where `t` is the type. 空格是相關的組件名稱以外的所有型別名稱元件。Spaces are relevant in all type name components except the assembly name. 在組件名稱 '，' 分隔符號之前的空格是相關的但是 '，' 分隔符號之後的空格會被忽略。In the assembly name, spaces before the ',' separator are relevant, but spaces after the ',' separator are ignored. 泛型引數的泛型型別本身都是由組件名稱所限定。Generic arguments of generic types are themselves qualified by assembly name. 例如，在組件限定類型名稱`MyGenericClass`(`MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，`int`展開的組件限定類型名稱為。For example, in the assembly-qualified type name for `MyGenericClass` (`MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), `int` is expanded to the assembly-qualified type name for . 如果目前物件代表泛型參數，則這個屬性會傳回`null`。If the current object represents a generic parameter, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示與類別相關聯的組件名稱和型別的完整的名稱。The following example displays the assembly name associated with the class and the fully qualified name of the type. [!code-cpp[type_assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CPP/type_assembly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/CS/type_assembly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_assembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_Assembly/VB/type_assembly.vb#1)] 下列範例會比較所傳回的字串方法和`Name`， ，和屬性。The following example compares the strings returned by the method and the `Name`, , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/cs/fullname1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/vb/fullname1.vb#1)]

span.span: A object representing the attribute set of the , unless the represents a generic type parameter, in which case the value is unspecified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些成員列舉型別都代表一組值的遮罩。Some members of the enumeration are masks that represent a group of values. 每個群組包含一個成員，其基礎值為零。Each group includes one member whose underlying value is zero. 比方說，基礎值的中的成員群組為零，因為中的成員群組。For example, the underlying value of the member in the group is zero, as is the member in the group. 基於這個原因，您必須使用之前先測試這些值的遮罩。Because of this, you must use the mask before testing for those values. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. > [!TIP] > 大部分用途而言，屬性，例如，，和容易使用與型別屬性。For most purposes, properties like ,, and are easier to use than type attributes. 如果目前代表建構的泛型類型，這個屬性傳回的泛型類型定義的屬性。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this property returns the attributes of the generic type definition. 例如，將傳回的屬性`MyGenericClass`(`MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中) 的屬性是`MyGenericClass`(`MyGenericClass(Of T)` Visual Basic 中)。For example, the attributes returned for `MyGenericClass` (`MyGenericClass(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) are the attributes of `MyGenericClass` (`MyGenericClass(Of T)` in Visual Basic). 如果目前代表泛型類型參數，也就是如果屬性會傳回`true`—未指定這個屬性所傳回的值。If the current represents a generic type parameter — that is, if the property returns `true` — the value returned by this property is unspecified. ## Examples 下列範例使用屬性。The following example usesthe property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底型別是從其目前的型別直接繼承的型別。The base type is the type from which the current type directly inherits. 是唯一的類型，並沒有基底類型，因此`null`會傳回基底型別。 is the only type that does not have a base type, therefore `null` is returned as the base type of . 介面繼承自零或多個基底介面。因此，這個屬性會傳回`null`如果`Type`物件表示的介面。Interfaces inherit from zero or more base interfaces; therefore, this property returns `null` if the `Type` object represents an interface. 基底介面可以判斷與或。The base interfaces can be determined with or . 如果目前代表建構的泛型類型，基底型別反映的泛型引數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, the base type reflects the generic arguments. 例如，請考慮下列宣告：For example, consider the following declarations: [!code-cpp[System.Type.BaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.BaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.BaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.basetype/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 建構的類型`C`(`C(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)，則屬性會傳回`B`。For the constructed type `C` (`C(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the property returns `B`. 如果目前代表的泛型類型定義的型別參數傳回類別條件約束，也就是將型別參數必須繼承的類別。If the current represents a type parameter of a generic type definition, returns the class constraint, that is, the class the type parameter must inherit. 如果沒有類別條件約束中，傳回。If there is no class constraint, returns . 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates using the property. [!code-cpp[TestBaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestBaseType/CPP/testbasetype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TestBaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestBaseType/CS/testbasetype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TestBaseType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestBaseType/VB/testbasetype.vb#1)] 下列範例會使用遞迴來列出每個類別的組件中找到完整的繼承階層架構。The following example uses recursion to list the complete inheritance hierarchy of each class found in an assembly. 此範例會定義名為類別`C`衍生自類別，名為`B`，它會接著衍生自類別，名為`A`。The example defines a class named `C` that derives from a class named `B`, which, in turn, derives from a class named `A`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立類型的執行個體，必須沒有泛型類型定義或開放式建構的類型中的類型引數型別本身，在任何封入泛型型別，或在任何項目型別。In order to create an instance of a type, there must be no generic type definitions or open constructed types in the type arguments of the type itself, in any enclosing generic types, or in any elements of the type. 另一種說法是，當檢查以遞迴方式、 型別必須包含沒有泛型類型參數。Another way of saying this is that when examined recursively, the type must contain no generic type parameters. 因為類型可能很複雜，做出這個決定並不容易。Since types can be arbitrarily complex, making this determination is difficult. 為了方便起見，並減少錯誤的機會屬性會提供標準的方式來區別封閉式建構類型，可以具現化，並開啟建構類型，不能。For convenience and to reduce the chance of error, the property provides a standard way to distinguish between closed constructed types, which can be instantiated, and open constructed types, which cannot. 如果屬性會傳回`true`，類型無法具現化。If the property returns `true`, the type cannot be instantiated. 以遞迴方式型別參數的屬性搜尋。The property searches recursively for type parameters. 例如，它會傳回`true`其項目是型別陣列`A`(`A(Of T)` Visual Basic 中)，即使陣列不是泛型本身。For example, it returns `true` for an array whose elements are type `A` (`A(Of T)` in Visual Basic), even though the array is not itself generic. 與此相反的行為與屬性，會傳回`false`陣列。Contrast this with the behavior of the property, which returns `false` for arrays. 範例類別和一個表格，顯示的值的一組屬性，請參閱。For a set of example classes and a table showing the values of the property, see . ## Examples 下列範例定義具有兩個類型參數的泛型類別，並接著定義第二個泛型類別衍生自第一個類別。The following example defines a generic class with two type parameters and then defines a second generic class that derives from the first class. 在衍生的類別的基底類別具有兩個類型引數： 第一個是第二個是衍生型別的型別參數。The derived class's base class has two type arguments: the first is and the second is a type parameter of the derived type. 此範例會顯示這些泛型類別的相關資訊，包括位置報告屬性。The example displays information about these generic classes, including the positions reported by the property. [!code-cpp[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宣告的方法是泛型方法定義。The declaring method is a generic method definition. 也就是說，如果不會傳回`null`，然後`DeclaringMethod.IsGenericMethodDefinition`傳回`true`。That is, if does not return `null`, then `DeclaringMethod.IsGenericMethodDefinition` returns `true`. 和屬性識別的泛型型別定義或泛型類型參數原本定義所在的泛型方法定義：The and properties identify the generic type definition or generic method definition in which the generic type parameter was originally defined: - 如果屬性會傳回，、 該代表泛型方法定義，以及目前物件都代表該泛型方法定義的型別參數。If the property returns a , that represents a generic method definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic method definition. - 如果屬性會傳回`null`，則屬性一律會傳回物件，代表泛型類型定義和目前物件都代表該泛型類型的型別參數定義。If the property returns `null`, then the property always returns a object representing a generic type definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic type definition. - 取得型別上的屬性其屬性是`false`就會擲回。Getting the property on a type whose property is `false` throws an . 傳回的屬性是如果是泛型方法，或在泛型建構函式的情況下。The that is returned by the property is either a in the case of a generic method, or a in the case of a generic constructor. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，不支援泛型建構函式。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, generic constructors are not supported. 如需泛型反映中所使用之規範的恆成立條件清單，請參閱 屬性備註。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義泛型方法，將型別引數指派給該方法，並叫用產生的建構泛型方法的類別。The following code example defines a class that has a generic method, assigns a type argument to the method, and invokes the resulting constructed generic method. 它也會顯示泛型方法定義和建構的方法的相關資訊。It also displays information about the generic method definition and the constructed method. 當顯示的相關資訊的型別參數的泛型方法定義，在`DisplayGenericMethodInfo`方法，範例程式碼顯示的值方法的泛型類型參數的屬性。When displaying information about the type parameters of the generic method definition, in the `DisplayGenericMethodInfo` method, the example code shows the value of the property for the method's generic type parameter. span.span: A reference to the default binder used by the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設繫結器提供與 common language runtime 是適用於所有最特殊的情況下除外。The default binder provided with the common language runtime is applicable in all but the most specialized circumstances. 如果您需要不同於提供的預設繫結器，如下所示規則定義的繫結器型別衍生自類別，並將該類型使用的執行個體傳遞`binder`參數的其中一個多載。If you need a binder that follows rules that differ from those of the supplied default binder, define a type derived from the class and pass an instance of that type using the `binder` parameter of one of the overloads. 反映模型一般類型系統的存取範圍規則。Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system. 比方說，如果呼叫端在相同的組件中，呼叫端不會不需要特殊權限的內部成員。For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members. 否則，呼叫端需要。Otherwise, the caller needs . 這是一致的受保護的成員查閱、 私用等等。This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on. 一般原則是擴展轉換，不會遺失資料只應該執行。The general principle is that should perform only widening conversions, which never lose data. 擴展轉換的範例轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數值的 32 位元帶正負號的整數的值。An example of a widening conversion is converting a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer. 這被區別縮小轉換，可能會遺失資料。This is distinguished from a narrowing conversion, which may lose data. 縮小轉換的範例 32 位元帶正負號的整數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數。An example of a narrowing conversion is converting a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer. 下表列出預設繫結器所支援的轉換。The following table lists the conversions supported by the default binder. |來源類型Source Type|目標類型Target Type| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何型別Any type|基底類型。Its base type.| |任何型別Any type|它所實作的介面。The interface it implements.| |CharChar|Unt16、 UInt32、 Int32、 UInt64、 Int64、 Single、 DoubleUnt16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |ByteByte|Char、 Unt16、 Int16、 UInt32、 Int32、 UInt64、 Int64、 Single、 DoubleChar, Unt16, Int16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |SByteSByte|Int16、Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt16, Int32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt16UInt16|UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int16Int16|Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt32UInt32|UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int32Int32|Int64、Single、DoubleInt64, Single, Double| |UInt64UInt64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |Int64Int64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |SingleSingle|DoubleDouble| |非參考Non-reference|參考。By-reference.| ## Examples 下列範例會取得預設繫結器，從`DefaultBinder`屬性，並叫用 MyClass 的成員，藉由傳遞`DefaultBinder`做為參數的值。The following example gets the default binder from the `DefaultBinder` property, and invokes a member of MyClass by passing the `DefaultBinder` value as a parameter to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位保留所使用的委派的參考方法。This field holds a reference to the delegate used by the method. 這個委派所封裝方法會採用兩個參數： 第一個是物件的第二個則`Object`。The method encapsulated by this delegate takes two parameters: the first is a object and the second is an `Object`. 這個方法會判斷是否`MemberInfo`物件名稱符合所指定的準則`Object`。The method determines whether the `MemberInfo` object matches the criteria specified by the `Object`. `Object`可能會指派任何一種類別欄位的值， ，或。The `Object` may be assigned the value of any one of the fields on the classes , , or . 例如，`Object`可以從欄位的值指派給`FieldAttributes`例如 Public。For example, the `Object` can be assigned the value of a field from `FieldAttributes` such as Public. 在此情況下，當`FilterAttribute`叫用委派時，它會傳回`true`所表示的方法時，才`MemberInfo`物件以公用欄位屬性裝飾中繼資料中。In that case, when the `FilterAttribute` delegate is invoked, it will return `true` only if the method represented by the `MemberInfo` object is decorated with the public field attribute in metadata. ## Examples 下列範例會取得`FilterAttribute`委派，將它傳遞做為參數方法，並顯示指定的成員和其屬性。The following example gets the `FilterAttribute` delegate, passes it as a parameter to the method, and displays the specified members and their attributes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位保留所使用的委派的參考方法。This field holds a reference to the delegate used by the method. 這個委派所封裝方法會採用兩個參數： 第一個是物件的第二個則`Object`。The method encapsulated by this delegate takes two parameters: the first is a object and the second is an `Object`. 這個方法會判斷是否`MemberInfo`物件名稱符合所指定的準則`Object`。The method determines whether the `MemberInfo` object matches the criteria specified by the `Object`. `Object`指派字串值，其中可能包含尾端"\*"萬用字元。The `Object` is assigned a string value, which may include a trailing "\*" wildcard character. 只有萬用字元結束字串支援比對。Only wildcard end string matching is supported. 比方說，`Object`可能會將值指派給 「 位元組 \*"。For example, the `Object` may be assigned the value "Byte\*". 在此情況下，當`FilterName`叫用委派時，它會傳回`true`所表示的方法時，才`MemberInfo`物件具有名稱開頭為"Byte"。In that case, when the `FilterName` delegate is invoked, it will return `true` only if the method represented by the `MemberInfo` object has a name that begins with "Byte". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會取得相關聯的使用者定義的方法`Application`型別。The following code example gets the methods associated with the user-defined `Application` type. [!code-cpp[Classic Type.FilterName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.FilterName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Type.FilterName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.FilterName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Type.FilterName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Type.FilterName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位保留所使用的委派的參考方法。This field holds a reference to the delegate used by the method. 這個委派所封裝方法會採用兩個參數： 第一個是物件的第二個則`Object`。The method encapsulated by this delegate takes two parameters: the first is a object and the second is an `Object`. 這個方法會判斷是否`MemberInfo`物件名稱符合所指定的準則`Object`。The method determines whether the `MemberInfo` object matches the criteria specified by the `Object`. `Object`指派字串值，其中可能包含尾端"\*"萬用字元。The `Object` is assigned a string value, which may include a trailing "\*" wildcard character. 只有萬用字元結束字串支援比對。Only wildcard end string matching is supported. 比方說，`Object`可能會將值指派給 「 位元組 \*"。For example, the `Object` may be assigned the value "ByTe\*". 在此情況下，當`FilterName`叫用委派時，它只會傳回，則為 true 所表示的方法如果`MemberInfo`物件具有名稱開頭為"byte"，忽略大小寫。In that case, when the `FilterName` delegate is invoked, it will return true only if the method represented by the `MemberInfo` object has a name that begins with "byte", ignoring case. ## Examples 下列範例會取得`MemberFilter`委派，將它傳遞做為參數方法，並顯示方法和其屬性`String`開頭字母"c"，忽略大小寫的類別。The following example gets the `MemberFilter` delegate, passes it as a parameter to the method, and displays the methods and their attributes of the `String` class that begin with the letter "c", disregarding the case. [!code-cpp[Type_FilterNameIgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FilterNameIgnoreCase/CPP/type_filternameignorecase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_FilterNameIgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FilterNameIgnoreCase/CS/type_filternameignorecase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_FilterNameIgnoreCase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FilterNameIgnoreCase/VB/type_filternameignorecase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 並所提供的委派類別可能也會使用，在的 lieu委派。The and delegates supplied by the class may also be used, in lieu of the delegate. 所有由這個類別所實作的介面會被視為在搜尋期間，是否為基底類別或此類別本身所宣告。All of the interfaces implemented by this class are considered during the search, whether declared by a base class or this class itself. 這個方法會搜尋基底類別階層中，傳回每個相符的介面以及所有比對的每個類別會實作這些介面實作的每個介面 （也就是會傳回相符的介面的遞移封閉）。This method searches the base class hierarchy, returning each of the matching interfaces each class implements as well as all the matching interfaces each of those interfaces implements (that is, the transitive closure of the matching interfaces is returned). 會不傳回任何重複的介面。No duplicate interfaces are returned. 如果目前表示泛型類型或泛型方法定義中的類型參數搜尋所有介面在宣告類型參數條件約束，並透過介面繼承的所有介面在條件約束中宣告。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, searches all the interfaces declared in the constraints on the type parameter, and all interfaces inherited through the interfaces declared in the constraints. 如果目前代表泛型類型的類型引數是否符合條件約束，搜尋所有的型別所實作的介面。If the current represents a type argument of a generic type, searches all the interfaces implemented by the type, whether or not they match constraints. > [!NOTE] > 可傳回泛型介面，即使在不是泛型的型別上。 can return generic interfaces, even on types that are not generic. 例如，可能會實作非泛型型別`IEnumerable`(`IEnumerable(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)。For example, a nongeneric type might implement `IEnumerable` (`IEnumerable(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下列範例會尋找指定的介面實作或繼承之指定的類型，並接著會顯示介面名稱。The following example finds the specified interface implemented or inherited by the specified type, and then displays the interface names. [!code-cpp[Type_FindInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindInterfaces/CPP/type_findinterfaces.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_FindInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindInterfaces/CS/type_findinterfaces.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_FindInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindInterfaces/VB/type_findinterfaces.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 成員包含屬性、 方法、 欄位、 事件等等。Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on. 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義要包含在搜尋中的成員：The following filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Instance`来包含在搜尋中的執行個體成員。Specify `BindingFlags.Instance` to include instance members in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.Static`要在搜尋中包含靜態成員。Specify `BindingFlags.Static` to include static members in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`来包含在搜尋中的公用成員。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要在搜尋中包含非公用成員 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護成員）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search. 下列輔助鍵旗標可以用來變更搜尋的運作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 若要搜尋只在宣告的成員，才，不只是繼承的成員。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the , not members that were simply inherited. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 有效值中所定義。Valid values for are defined in . 如果找不到任何這類成員，則會傳回空陣列。If no such members are found, an empty array is returned. 若要取得使用此方法的類別初始設定式 (.cctor)，您必須指定 | ( `Or` 在 Visual Basic 中)。To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 您也可以取得類別初始設定式使用屬性。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 如果目前表示泛型類型或泛型方法的類型參數處理任何由類別條件約束和介面條件約束的型別參數宣告的成員。If the current represents a type parameter of a generic type or generic method, processes any members declared by the class constraint and the interface constraints of the type parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會尋找符合指定的搜尋準則，類別中的所有成員，並接著會顯示相符的成員。The following example finds all the members in a class that match the specified search criteria, and then displays the matched members. [!code-cpp[Type_FindMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindMembers/CPP/type_findmembers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_FindMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindMembers/CS/type_findmembers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_FindMembers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_FindMembers/VB/type_findmembers.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得類型的完整名稱 (包括其命名空間，但不包括其組件)。

value.span: 類型的完整名稱 (包括其命名空間，但不包括其組件)；如果目前執行個體代表泛型類型參數、陣列類型、指標類型、根據類型參數的 類型，或不是泛型類型定義但包含未解析類型參數的泛型類型，則為 。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the type, including its namespace but not its assembly; or if the current instance represents a generic type parameter, an array type, pointer type, or type based on a type parameter, or a generic type that is not a generic type definition but contains unresolved type parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，完整的名稱的型別是`System.String`。For example, the fully qualified name of the type is `System.String`. 這與傳回的組件限定名稱相反屬性，其中包含的完整名稱，再加上完整的組件名稱。Contrast this with the assembly-qualified name returned by the property, which consists of the full name plus the full assembly name. 如果目前的型別代表封閉泛型型別，在字串中的類型引數傳回屬性是其完整的組件名稱限定，即使所有未限定的泛型型別本身的字串表示組件名稱。If the current type represents a closed generic type, the type arguments in the string returned by the property are qualified by their full assembly name, even though the string representation of the generic type itself is not qualified by its full assembly name. 下列範例說明代表泛型類型定義的類型，而另一個代表封閉泛型類型的 FullName 屬性中的差異。The following example illustrates the difference in the FullName property for a type that represents generic type definition and one that represents a closed generic type. [!code-csharp[System.Type.FullName#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/fullnameex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.FullName#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/fullnameex1.vb#2)] 這個屬性會傳回`null`如果：This property returns `null` if: - 目前物件代表泛型型別的型別參數。The current object represents a type parameter of a generic type. 下列範例會擷取的型別參數型別，並且嘗試顯示其屬性。The following example retrieves the type parameter of the type and attempts to display its property. [!code-csharp[System.Type.FullName#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/Fullname3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Type.FullName#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/Fullname3.vb#3)] - 目前物件都代表陣列類型、 指標類型或`byref`為基礎的泛型類型參數的型別。The current object represents an array type, a pointer type, or a `byref` type that is based on a generic type parameter. 下列範例會定義泛型型別， `Generictype1`，以三個方法： `Display(T[])`，傳遞的型別 T，陣列`HandleT(T)`，傳遞 T 物件和`ChangeValue(ref T)`，這傳址方式傳遞的 T 物件。The following example defines a generic type, `Generictype1`, with three methods: `Display(T[])`, which is passed an array of type T; `HandleT(T)`, which is passed a T object; and `ChangeValue(ref T)`, which is passed a T object by reference. 因為 C# 和 Visual Basic 不允許我們定義 T 中的指標`HandleT`方法中，我們必須呼叫方法物件，表示方法的參數類型，若要建立泛型類型的指標。Because C# and Visual Basic do not allow us to define T as a pointer in the `HandleT` method, we have to call the method on the object that represents the method's parameter type to create a pointer to a generic type. 範例輸出所顯示的是，所有的三種情況下，在屬性是`null`。The output from the example shows that in all three cases, the property is `null`. [!code-csharp[System.Type.FullName#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/Fullname4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Type.FullName#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/FullName4.vb#4)] - 目前的型別包含有尚未被特定類型取代的泛型類型參數 (亦即屬性會傳回`true`)，但類型不是泛型類型定義 (也就是屬性會傳回 `false`The current type contains generic type parameters that have not been replaced by specific types (that is, the property returns `true`), but the type is not a generic type definition (that is, the property returns `false` 在下列範例中，`Derived`繼承自`Base`。In the following example, `Derived` inherits from `Base`. 屬性取得物件，代表基底型別`Derived`，並將其屬性會傳回`null`。The property obtains the object that represents the base type of `Derived`, and its property returns `null`. [!code-csharp[System.Type.FullName#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/cs/Fullname5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Type.FullName#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.fullname/vb/FullName5.vb#5)] 若要取得不是`null`，您可以使用方法以取得泛型型別定義，如範例所示。To get a that is not `null`, you can use the method to get the generic type definition, as the example illustrates. 這個屬性是唯讀的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示指定之型別的完整名稱。The following example displays the full name of the specified type. [!code-cpp[TestFullName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestFullName/CPP/TestFullName.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TestFullName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestFullName/CS/testfullname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TestFullName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TestFullName/VB/testfullname.vb#1)] 下列範例會比較所傳回的字串方法和`Name`， ，和屬性。The following example compares the strings returned by the method and the `Name`, , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/cs/fullname1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.tostring/vb/fullname1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得一組 旗標，敘述目前泛型類型參數的共變數與特殊條件約束。

span.span: Gets a combination of flags that describe the covariance and special constraints of the current generic type parameter.

value.span: 值的位元組合，描述目前泛型類型參數的共變數和特殊條件約束。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that describes the covariance and special constraints of the current generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值包含旗標，敘述目前泛型類型參數是否是 covariant 和其他特殊條件約束的旗標。The value of this property contains flags that describe whether the current generic type parameter is covariant, and flags that describe any special constraints. 使用 值加入選取的共變數旗標，並使用選取條件約束旗標的值。Use the value to select the covariance flags, and use the value to select the constraint flags. 如需泛型反映中所使用之規範的恆成立條件清單，請參閱 屬性備註。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義泛型型別`Test`具有兩個具有不同的條件約束的型別參數。The following code example defines a generic type `Test` with two type parameters that have different constraints. 當程式執行時，條件約束會檢查使用屬性和方法。When the program executes, the constraints are examined using the property and the method. [!code-cpp[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當 物件表示泛型類型或泛型方法的類型參數時，在宣告參數的泛型類型或泛型方法之類型參數清單中，取得類型參數的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the type parameter in the type parameter list of the generic type or method that declared the parameter, when the object represents a type parameter of a generic type or a generic method.

value.span: 型別參數在宣告參數的泛型類型或方法之型別參數清單中的位置。

span.span: The position of a type parameter in the type parameter list of the generic type or method that defines the parameter.

value.span: 位置編號從 0 開始。

span.span: Position numbers begin at 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回型別參數的位置中的泛型型別定義或泛型方法定義的參數清單的型別參數原本定義。The property returns the position of a type parameter in the parameter list of the generic type definition or generic method definition where the type parameter was originally defined. 和屬性識別的泛型型別或方法定義：The and properties identify the generic type or method definition: - 如果屬性會傳回，、 該代表泛型方法定義，以及目前物件都代表該泛型方法定義的型別參數。If the property returns a , that represents a generic method definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic method definition. - 如果屬性會傳回`null`，則屬性一律會傳回物件，代表泛型類型定義和目前物件都代表該泛型類型的型別參數定義。If the property returns `null`, then the property always returns a object representing a generic type definition, and the current object represents a type parameter of that generic type definition. 若要提供正確的內容值的屬性，就必須找出的泛型類型或方法所屬的型別參數。To provide the correct context for the value of the property, it is necessary to identify the generic type or method a type parameter belongs to. 例如，請考慮泛型方法的傳回值`GetSomething`下列程式碼：For example, consider the return value of the generic method `GetSomething` in the following code: [!code-cpp[System.Type.GenericParameterPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.genericparameterposition/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GenericParameterPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.genericparameterposition/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GenericParameterPosition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.type.genericparameterposition/vb/remarks.vb#1)] 傳回的型別`GetSomething`取決於提供給類別的型別引數`A`以及`GetSomething`本身。The type returned by `GetSomething` depends on the type arguments supplied to class `A` and to `GetSomething` itself. 您可以取得針對`GetSomething`，以及您可以從所取得的傳回型別。You can obtain a for `GetSomething`, and from that you can obtain the return type. 當您檢查型別參數的傳回型別，兩者會傳回 0。When you examine the type parameters of the return type, returns 0 for both. 位置`V`為 0，因為`V`類別的型別參數清單中的第一個型別參數`A`。The position of `V` is 0 because `V` is the first type parameter in the type parameter list for class `A`. 位置`X`為 0，因為`X`的型別參數清單中的第一個型別參數`GetSomething`。The position of `X` is 0 because `X` is the first type parameter in the type parameter list for `GetSomething`. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫屬性會造成例外狀況，如果目前不代表型別參數。Calling the property causes an exception if the current does not represent a type parameter. 當您檢查開放式建構類型的類型引數時，使用告訴它們在型別參數，以及這是類型的屬性。When you examine the type arguments of an open constructed type, use the property to tell which are type parameters and which are types. 屬性會傳回`true`型別參數; 您可以接著使用方法來取得它的位置，並使用和來判斷泛型方法或類型定義中定義的屬性.The property returns `true` for a type parameter; you can then use the method to obtain its position and use the and properties to determine the generic method or type definition that defines it. ## Examples 下列範例會定義具有兩個類型參數的泛型類別，並定義第二個泛型類別衍生自第一個類別。The following example defines a generic class with two type parameters and defines a second generic class that derives from the first class. 在衍生的類別的基底類別具有兩個類型引數： 第一個是，第二個是衍生型別的型別參數。The derived class's base class has two type arguments: the first is , and the second is a type parameter of the derived type. 此範例會顯示這些泛型類別的相關資訊，包括位置報告屬性。The example displays information about these generic classes, including the positions reported by the property. [!code-cpp[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.HasUnboundGenericParameters/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得此類型之泛型型別引數的陣列。

span.span: Gets an array of the generic type arguments for this type.

value.span: 這個類型之泛型型別引數的陣列。

span.span: An array of the generic type arguments for this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得僅泛用型別引數;也就是由目前類型的泛型型別參數尚未指定的類型。This property gets only the generic type arguments; that is, the types that have been specified for the generic type parameters of the current type. 如果目前的類型是泛型類型定義，則這個屬性會傳回空陣列。If the current type is a generic type definition, this property returns an empty array. > [!NOTE] > 如果另一種泛型類型或泛型方法中使用泛型型別，則其泛型型別引數的一些可能的封入方法或類型的泛型型別參數。If a generic type is used in a generic method or in another generic type, some of its generic type arguments might be generic type parameters of the enclosing method or type. 若要取得的類型，代表泛型類型定義的泛型類型參數，請使用屬性。To get the generic type parameters of a type that represents a generic type definition, use the property. 若要取得目前的物件物件，請使用擴充方法。To get a object for the current object, use the extension method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法多載會尋找公用的執行個體建構函式，並無法用來取得類別初始設定式 (.cctor)。This method overload looks for public instance constructors and cannot be used to obtain a class initializer (.cctor). 若要取得類別初始設定式，使用多載採用，並指定 | ( `Or` Visual Basic 中)。To get a class initializer, use an overload that takes , and specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 您也可以取得類別初始設定式使用屬性。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 如果要求的建構函式為非公用，則這個方法會傳回`null`。If the requested constructor is non-public, this method returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 查詢建構函式和方法時，您不能省略參數。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 叫用時，您只可以省略參數。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義中這個方法永遠傳回`null`。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method always returns `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會取得的型別`MyClass`，取得物件，並顯示建構函式簽章。The following example obtains the type of `MyClass`, gets the object, and displays the constructor signature. [!code-cpp[Type_GetConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor/CPP/type_getconstructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor/CS/type_getconstructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Type_GetConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor/VB/type_getconstructor.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有完全相符，`binder`會嘗試強制轉型中指定的參數類型`types`，就可以選取 相符項目陣列。If an exact match does not exist, the `binder` will attempt to coerce the parameter types specified in the `types` array in order to select a match. 如果`binder`無法選取相符項目，然後`null`會傳回。If the `binder` is unable to select a match, then `null` is returned. 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義要包含在搜尋中的建構函式：The following filter flags can be used to define which constructors to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`来包含在搜尋中的公用建構函式。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public constructors in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要在搜尋中包含非公用建構函式 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護建構函式）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public constructors (that is, private, internal, and protected constructors) in the search. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 若要取得使用這個方法多載類別初始設定式 (.cctor)，您必須指定 | ( `Or` 在 Visual Basic 中)。To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method overload, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 您也可以取得類別初始設定式使用屬性。You can also get the class initializer using the property. > [!NOTE] > 查詢建構函式和方法時，您不能省略參數。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 叫用時，您只可以省略參數。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義中這個方法永遠傳回`null`。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method always returns `null`. ## Examples 下列程式會取得的型別`MyClass1`類別，取得物件比對指定的繫結旗標，並顯示建構函式的簽章。The following program obtains the type of `MyClass1` class, gets the object matching the specified binding flags, and displays the signature of the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然預設繫結器不會處理(`modifiers`參數)，您可以使用抽象類別，以寫入未處理的自訂繫結器`modifiers`。Although the default binder does not process (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`. `ParameterModifier` 透過 COM interop 呼叫時才會使用和處理傳址方式傳遞的參數。`ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled. 如果沒有完全相符，`binder`會嘗試強制轉型中指定的參數類型`types`，就可以選取 相符項目陣列。If an exact match does not exist, the `binder` will attempt to coerce the parameter types specified in the `types` array in order to select a match. 如果`binder`無法選取相符項目，然後`null`會傳回。If the `binder` is unable to select a match, then `null` is returned. 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義要包含在搜尋中的建構函式：The following filter flags can be used to define which constructors to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`来包含在搜尋中的公用建構函式。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public constructors in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要在搜尋中包含非公用建構函式 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護建構函式）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public constructors (that is, private, internal, and protected constructors) in the search. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 若要取得使用此方法的類別初始設定式 (.cctor)，您必須指定 | ( `Or` 在 Visual Basic 中)。To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 您也可以取得類別初始設定式使用屬性。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 下表顯示基底類別成員會傳回由`Get`反映型別上時的方法。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成員類型Member Type|StaticStatic|非靜態Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |建構函式Constructor|否No|否No| |欄位Field|否No|可以。Yes. 欄位永遠是依名稱和簽章隱藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |Event - 事件Event|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. （虛擬和非虛擬） 的方法可以隱藏依名稱或依名稱和簽章隱藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |巢狀的類型Nested Type|否No|否No| |屬性Property|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| 1. 依名稱和簽章隱藏會考慮所有組件的簽章，包括自訂修飾詞，傳回類型、 參數類型、 sentinels 和 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 這是二進位比較。This is a binary comparison. 2. 反映的屬性和事件會依名稱和簽章隱藏。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果您同時有 get 和 set 存取子的屬性在基底類別中，但衍生的類別有只有 get 存取子，在衍生的類別的屬性會隱藏基底類別屬性中，並不能存取的基底類別的 setter。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自訂屬性不屬於一般類型系統。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. > [!NOTE] > 查詢建構函式和方法時，您不能省略參數。You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods. 叫用時，您只可以省略參數。You can only omit parameters when invoking. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義中這個方法永遠傳回`null`。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method always returns `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會取得的型別`MyClass1`，取得符合指定的繫結旗標，並顯示建構函式簽章的物件。The following example obtains the type of `MyClass1`, gets the object that matches the specified binding flags, and displays the constructor signature. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會傳回特定的順序，例如依宣告順序的建構函式。The method does not return constructors in a particular order, such as declaration order. 您的程式碼不得相依於建構函式會傳回的順序，因為順序不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which constructors are returned, because that order varies. `bindingAttr` 可用來指定是否要傳回只有公用建構函式或公用和非公用建構函式。`bindingAttr` can be used to specify whether to return only public constructors or both public and non-public constructors. 如果沒有完全相符，`binder`會嘗試強制轉型中指定的參數類型`types`，就可以選取 相符項目陣列。If an exact match does not exist, the `binder` will attempt to coerce the parameter types specified in the `types` array in order to select a match. 如果`binder`無法選取相符項目，然後`null`會傳回。If the `binder` is unable to select a match, then `null` is returned. 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義要包含在搜尋中的建構函式：The following filter flags can be used to define which constructors to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`来包含在搜尋中的公用建構函式。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public constructors in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要在搜尋中包含非公用建構函式 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護建構函式）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public constructors (that is, private, internal, and protected constructors) in the search. 不會傳回基底類別建構函式。Constructors of base classes are not returned. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 若要取得使用這個方法多載類別初始設定式 (.cctor)，您必須指定 | ( `Or` 在 Visual Basic 中)。To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method overload, you must specify | (`Or` in Visual Basic). 您也可以取得類別初始設定式使用屬性。You can also get the class initializer using the property. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數的物件。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 例如，如果類別`C`的建構函式`C(T t1)`(`Sub New(ByVal t1 As T)`在 Visual Basic 中)，則呼叫上`C`傳回表示`C(int t1)`C# 中 (`Sub New(ByVal t1 As Integer)` Visual Basic 中)。For example, if class `C` has a constructor `C(T t1)` (`Sub New(ByVal t1 As T)` in Visual Basic), calling on `C` returns a that represents `C(int t1)` in C# (`Sub New(ByVal t1 As Integer)` in Visual Basic). 如果目前代表泛型類型參數，方法會傳回空陣列。If the current represents a generic type parameter, the method returns an empty array. ## Examples 此範例中顯示的輸出自類別具有兩個執行個體建構函式和一個靜態的建構函式多載。This example shows the output of the overload from a class that has two instance constructors and one static constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會傳回成員以特定順序，例如依字母順序或依宣告順序。The method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 您的程式碼不得相依於成員會傳回的順序，因為順序不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies. 在衍生類別可以覆寫此方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 成員包含屬性、 方法、 欄位、 事件等等。Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on. 下表顯示基底類別成員會傳回由`Get`反映型別上時的方法。The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type. |成員類型Member Type|StaticStatic|非靜態Non-Static| |-----------------|------------|-----------------| |建構函式Constructor|否No|否No| |欄位Field|否No|可以。Yes. 欄位永遠是依名稱和簽章隱藏。A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.| |Event - 事件Event|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. （虛擬和非虛擬） 的方法可以隱藏依名稱或依名稱和簽章隱藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |巢狀的類型Nested Type|否No|否No| |屬性Property|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| 1. 依名稱和簽章隱藏會考慮所有組件的簽章，包括自訂修飾詞，傳回類型、 參數類型、 sentinels 和 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 這是二進位比較。This is a binary comparison. 2. 反映的屬性和事件會依名稱和簽章隱藏。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果您同時有 get 和 set 存取子的屬性在基底類別中，但衍生的類別有只有 get 存取子，在衍生的類別的屬性會隱藏基底類別屬性中，並不能存取的基底類別的 setter。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自訂屬性不屬於一般類型系統。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數的物件。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 比方說，如果類別`C`具有屬性`P`會傳回`T`，則呼叫上`C`傳回`int P`在 C# (`Property P As Integer` Visual Basic 中)。For example, if class `C` has a property `P` that returns `T`, calling on `C` returns `int P` in C# (`Property P As Integer` in Visual Basic). 如果目前代表型別參數的泛型類型或泛型方法，這個方法定義中搜尋類別條件約束的成員或成員是否沒有類別條件約束。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of if there is no class constraint. ## Examples 下列範例會取得的預設成員資訊`MyClass`並顯示的預設成員。The following example obtains the default member information of `MyClass` and displays the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| 1. 依名稱和簽章隱藏會考慮所有組件的簽章，包括自訂修飾詞，傳回類型、 參數類型、 sentinels 和 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 這是二進位比較。This is a binary comparison. 2. 反映的屬性和事件會依名稱和簽章隱藏。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果您同時有 get 和 set 存取子的屬性在基底類別中，但衍生的類別有只有 get 存取子，在衍生的類別的屬性會隱藏基底類別屬性中，並不能存取的基底類別的 setter。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自訂屬性不屬於一般類型系統。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義，這個方法會搜尋類別條件約束的事件。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並取得指定之事件的按鈕類別的事件。The following example creates an object and gets the event for a button class for the specified event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義所要包含在搜尋事件：The following filter flags can be used to define which events to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`来包含在搜尋中的公用事件。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public events in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜尋中包含非公用事件 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護的事件）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public events (that is, private, internal, and protected events) in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包含`public`和`protected`階層; 的靜態成員`private`中繼承類別的靜態成員不包含。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 下列輔助鍵旗標可以用來變更搜尋的運作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 忽略大小寫的`name`。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 若要搜尋只上宣告的事件，不只是繼承的事件。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the events declared on the , not events that were simply inherited. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 事件會被視為公用反映，是否至少一個方法或公用存取子。An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public. 否則，事件會視為私用，而且您必須使用 | | (在 Visual Basic 中，使用值的結合`Or`) 來取得它。Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use | | (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義，這個方法會搜尋類別條件約束的事件。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來搜尋的公用或非公用事件名為"Click"不是型別`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)。The following code example uses the method to search a type for a public or non-public event named "Click" that is not `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic). 事件Event|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. （虛擬和非虛擬） 的方法可以隱藏依名稱或依名稱和簽章隱藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |巢狀的類型Nested Type|否No|否No| |屬性Property|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| 1. 依名稱和簽章隱藏會考慮所有組件的簽章，包括自訂修飾詞，傳回類型、 參數類型、 sentinels 和 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 這是二進位比較。This is a binary comparison. 2. 反映的屬性和事件會依名稱和簽章隱藏。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果您同時有 get 和 set 存取子的屬性在基底類別中，但衍生的類別有只有 get 存取子，在衍生的類別的屬性會隱藏基底類別屬性中，並不能存取的基底類別的 setter。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自訂屬性不屬於一般類型系統。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義要包含在搜尋中的欄位：The following filter flags can be used to define which fields to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`搜尋範圍包含公用欄位。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public fields in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要在搜尋中包含非公用欄位 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護欄位）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public fields (that is, private, internal, and protected fields) in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包含`public`和`protected`階層; 的靜態成員`private`中繼承類別的靜態成員不包含。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 下列輔助鍵旗標可以用來變更搜尋的運作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 忽略大小寫的`name`。`BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`. - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 若要搜尋只上宣告的欄位，不只是繼承的欄位。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the fields declared on the , not fields that were simply inherited. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義，這個方法會搜尋類別條件約束的欄位。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the fields of the class constraint. ## Examples 下列範例會取得`Type`物件指定的類別，取得符合指定的繫結旗標，並顯示欄位的值之欄位的物件。The following example gets the `Type` object for the specified class, obtains the object for the field that matches the specified binding flags, and displays the value of the field. [!code-cpp[Type_GetField#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetField/CPP/type_getfield.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Type_GetField#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetField/CS/type_getfield.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Type_GetField#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetField/VB/type_getfield.vb#2)]

事件Event|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| |方法Method|否No|可以。Yes. （虛擬和非虛擬） 的方法可以隱藏依名稱或依名稱和簽章隱藏。A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.| |巢狀的類型Nested Type|否No|否No| |屬性Property|不適用Not applicable|一般類型系統規則是繼承實作屬性的方法相同。The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property. 反映會視為由名稱和簽章隱藏屬性。Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature. 請參閱附註 2。See note 2 below.| 1. 依名稱和簽章隱藏會考慮所有組件的簽章，包括自訂修飾詞，傳回類型、 參數類型、 sentinels 和 unmanaged 呼叫慣例。Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions. 這是二進位比較。This is a binary comparison. 2. 反映的屬性和事件會依名稱和簽章隱藏。For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature. 如果您同時有 get 和 set 存取子的屬性在基底類別中，但衍生的類別有只有 get 存取子，在衍生的類別的屬性會隱藏基底類別屬性中，並不能存取的基底類別的 setter。If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class. 3. 自訂屬性不屬於一般類型系統。Custom attributes are not part of the common type system. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數的物件。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義，這個方法會搜尋類別條件約束的公用欄位。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the public fields of the class constraint. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用`GetFields()`方法。The following example shows a use of the `GetFields()` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會傳回欄位以特定順序，例如依字母順序或依宣告順序。The method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order. 您的程式碼不得相依於欄位會傳回的順序，因為順序不同。Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order varies. 下列篩選器旗標可以用來定義要包含在搜尋中的欄位：The following filter flags can be used to define which fields to include in the search: - 您必須指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`以取得傳回值。You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return. - 指定`BindingFlags.Public`搜尋範圍包含公用欄位。Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public fields in the search. - 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要在搜尋中包含非公用欄位 （也就是私用、 內部和受保護欄位）。Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public fields (that is, private, internal, and protected fields) in the search. 只有受保護，而且會傳回基底類別上的內部欄位;不會傳回基底類別上的私用欄位。Only protected and internal fields on base classes are returned; private fields on base classes are not returned. - 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包含`public`和`protected`階層; 的靜態成員`private`中繼承類別的靜態成員不包含。Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included. 下列輔助鍵旗標可以用來變更搜尋的運作方式：The following modifier flags can be used to change how the search works: - `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 若要搜尋只上宣告的欄位，不只是繼承的欄位。`BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the fields declared on the , not fields that were simply inherited. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。See for more information. 如果目前代表建構的泛型型別，這個方法會傳回具有由適當的型別引數取代型別參數的物件。If the current represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments. 如果目前表示的類型參數的泛型類型或泛型方法定義，這個方法會搜尋類別條件約束的公用欄位。If the current represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the public fields of the class constraint. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用`GetFields(BindingFlags)`方法。The following example shows a use of the `GetFields(BindingFlags)` method. summary.span: 傳回 物件的陣列，代表封閉泛型類型的類型引數，或泛型類型定義的類型參數。

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the type arguments of a closed generic type or the type parameters of a generic type definition.

returns.span: 由 物件組成的陣列，代表泛型類型的類型引數。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic type.

returns.span: 如果目前的類型不是泛型類型，則傳回空的陣列。

span.span: Returns an empty array if the current type is not a generic type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列項目會以其出現在類型引數的泛型型別清單的順序傳回。The array elements are returned in the order in which they appear in the list of type arguments for the generic type. - 如果目前的型別是封閉式的建構型別 (亦即屬性會傳回`false`)，所傳回的陣列方法包含已指派給泛型類型定義的泛型類型參數的型別.If the current type is a closed constructed type (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic type definition. - 如果目前的類型是泛型類型定義，陣列會包含型別參數。If the current type is a generic type definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果目前的型別是開放式建構的類型 (亦即屬性會傳回`true`) 中的所有型別參數和封閉式泛型類型或方法的型別參數尚未指派哪一個特定的類型，此陣列包含型別和型別參數。If the current type is an open constructed type (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have not been assigned to all of the type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types or methods, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用辨別這兩者的屬性。Use the property to tell them apart. 如需示範此案例中，請參閱的程式碼範例屬性。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example for the property. 如需泛型反映中所使用之規範的恆成立條件清單，請參閱 屬性備註。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用来顯示的型別引數建構的型別以及其泛型型別定義的類型參數的方法。The following code example uses the method to display the type arguments of a constructed type and the type parameters of its generic type definition. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分屬性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. 請參閱範例輸出的較大範例。See the larger example for sample output. [!code-cpp[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The invoked method is not supported in the base class.

exception.span: 衍生類別必須提供實作。

span.span: Derived classes must provide an implementation.

summary.span: 傳回由 物件組成的陣列，這些物件代表對目前泛型類型參數所設下的條件約束。

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the constraints on the current generic type parameter.

returns.span: 由 物件組成的陣列，這些物件代表對目前泛型類型參數所設下的條件約束。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the constraints on the current generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型類型參數上的每個條件約束會表示為物件。Each constraint on a generic type parameter is expressed as a object. 使用屬性來判斷條件約束是否是基底類別條件約束; 如果這個屬性傳回`false`，條件約束是介面條件約束。Use the property to determine whether a constraint is the base class constraint; if the property returns `false`, the constraint is an interface constraint. 如果類型參數有沒有類別條件約束和介面條件約束，則會傳回空陣列。If a type parameter has no class constraint and no interface constraints, an empty array is returned. 如需泛型反映中所使用之規範的恆成立條件清單，請參閱 屬性備註。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義泛型型別`Test`具有兩個具有不同的條件約束的型別參數。The following code example defines a generic type `Test` with two type parameters that have different constraints. 當程式執行時，條件約束會檢查使用屬性和方法。When the program executes, the constraints are examined using the property and the method. [!code-cpp[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 目前的 物件不是泛型型別參數。

span.span: The current object is not a generic type parameter.
That is, the property returns .

summary.span: 傳回代表泛型類型定義的 物件，利用此泛型類型定義就可以建構出目前的泛型類型。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a generic type definition from which the current generic type can be constructed.

returns.span: 代表泛型類型的 物件，利用此泛型類型就可以建構出目前的類型。

span.span: A object representing a generic type from which the current type can be constructed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型類型定義是可從中建構其他類型的範本。A generic type definition is a template from which other types can be constructed. 例如，從泛型類型定義`G`（以 C# 語法;`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 或`generic ref class G`c + + 中) 您可以建構和具現化型別`G`(`G(Of Integer)` Visual Basic 中)。For example, from the generic type definition `G` (expressed in C# syntax; `G(Of T)` in Visual Basic or `generic ref class G` in C++) you can construct and instantiate the type `G` (`G(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic). 給定物件，代表這個建構的型別，方法會傳回泛型型別定義。Given a object representing this constructed type, the method returns the generic type definition. 如果兩個建構的型別會建立從相同的泛型類型定義中，使用相同的型別引數，方法會傳回相同這兩種類型的物件。If two constructed types are created from the same generic type definition, using the same type arguments, the method returns the same object for both types. 如果您呼叫方法物件，已表示泛型類型定義，它會傳回目前。If you call the method on a object that already represents a generic type definition, it returns the current . > [!IMPORTANT] > 泛型類型的陣列不是泛型本身。An array of generic types is not itself generic. 在 C# 程式碼`A[] v;`或 Visual Basic 程式碼`Dim v() As A(Of Integer)`，變數的型別`v`不是泛型。In the C# code `A[] v;` or the Visual Basic code `Dim v() As A(Of Integer)`, the type of variable `v` is not generic. 使用來判斷類型是否為泛型之前先呼叫。Use to determine whether a type is generic before calling . 如需泛型反映中所使用之規範的恆成立條件清單，請參閱 屬性備註。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the property remarks. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建構類型的執行個體建立使用一般的執行個體建立，並接著會使用和方法來擷取建構的型別和泛型型別定義。The following code example creates an instance of a constructed type by using ordinary instance creation and then uses the and methods to retrieve the constructed type and the generic type definition. 此範例中使用泛型型別，建構的型別代表的`Test`具有字串索引鍵的物件。This example uses the generic type; the constructed type represents a of `Test` objects with string keys. [!code-cpp[System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition/VB/source.vb#1)]
